Description: I have one GK3 and one GK2 available. Each is $100, just wanted to clarify.The GK-3 Guitar Pickup from Roland offers access to Roland Guitar Synthesizers for all electric guitarists! The GK-3 pickup has been completely redesigned for optimum response. It's 30% thinner than its predecessor and now uses a standard 1/4" jack for normal guitar input. Fully adjustable for the best response The GK-3 and GK2 pickup now includes an adjustable curve design that keeps an even distance between the strings, guaranteeing the best possible response. Even the pickup cable length is adjustable! Les Paul players can now join the party With the GK-3, Roland hasn't left out any electric guitars! If you play a Les Paul-type guitar you can safely install the GK-3 without any drilling by using an included special attachment plate. I also have for sale the GK2. Both work great and do the same thing.
Title: Roland GK3 and GK2 pickup
